thread.title: Fantastic Beasts wins the first Oscar for Harry Potter
thread.title_full: Fantastic Beasts wins the first Oscar for Harry Potter

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Fantastic Beasts wins the first Oscar for Harry Potter
text:
It's hard to believe, but Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them has won the first-ever Oscar for the Harry Potter franchise. Colleen Atwood scooped her fourth career Oscar win for Best Costume Design for the well-received wizarding world spin-off, marking the first time that a film in the Harry Potter series has won an Academy Award.
It's not like the films weren't up for awards before â€“ with previous nominations including Philosopher's Stone being up for three awards, while Prisoner of Azkaban was up for Best Original Score.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Getty Fantastic Beasts might scoop the second award for the Harry Potter franchise as it's also nominated for Best Production Design.
